sqrt2 = 1,4142135623731

sqrt2^2 = 2 (should equal 2)

pwer215 = 1,14869835499704

epi = 23,1406926327793

pie = 22,459157718361


Double Gamma Calculations:
Lambda(1) = 0,999999989064903, ln(Lambda(1))=-1,09350976051914E-08, (x-1)! = 1, ln(x-1)! = 0
Lambda(2) = 0,999999989064903, ln(Lambda(2))=-1,09350976051914E-08, (x-1)! = 1, ln(x-1)! = 0
Lambda(3) = 1,99999997812981, ln(Lambda(3))=0,693147169624848, (x-1)! = 2, ln(x-1)! = 0,693147180559945
Lambda(4) = 5,99999993438942, ln(Lambda(4))=1,79175945829296, (x-1)! = 6, ln(x-1)! = 1,79175946922805
